author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is interested in learning how other local governments project new positions – 3 to 5 years out.  Methodologies, justification, processes, etc.  Whatever help/documents, etc. you can provide is appreciated!
Pamela Muse
West Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org 
888-468-6450
title: 3-5 Year New Position Forecasting
